Class EntityPool.ManagedEntity

java.lang.Object
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.EntityPool.ManagedEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Entity, java.lang.Comparable<Entity>, java.lang.Iterable<Component>
Enclosing class:
EntityPool
public class EntityPool.ManagedEntity
extends java.lang.Object
implements Entity
An Entity implementation attached to its owning EntityPool and with exposed management methods.
